name: t12_state_machine
description: State machine with function-pointer transition tables, cross-file state handlers, and static-scoped helper functions. Combines enum dispatch, fptr tables, and static name collisions.
oracle_pressure: State machine transitions via function-pointer tables produce complex indirect call graphs. Each handler file has static helpers with identical names. Oracle must disambiguate which 'on_enter'/'on_exit' belongs to which CU and correlate DW_TAG_subprogram scoping with DW_AT_decl_file.
